
.. _env list_ref:

conda env list
=======================

.. raw:: html

   <PRE>
   <!-- Manpage converted by man2html 3.0.1 -->
   <B>CONDA(1)</B>                         User Commands                        <B>CONDA(1)</B>
   
   
   
   NAME
          conda - conda env list
   
   DESCRIPTION
          usage: conda-env list [-h] [--json]
   
          List the Conda environments
   
   OPTIONS
      optional arguments:
          -h, --help
                 Show this help message and exit.
   
          --json Report all output as json. Suitable for using conda programmati‚Äê
                 cally.
   
      examples:
                 conda env list conda env list --json
   
   
   
   Continuum Analytics             September 2016                        <B>CONDA(1)</B>
   </PRE>
